Union Conference Record (Australasian), July 28, 1899
     644. The light given me is that it will not be very long before we shall have to give up using any animal food. Even milk will have to be discarded. Disease is accumulating rapidly. The curse of God is upon the earth, because man has cursed it. The habits and practices of men have brought the earth into such a condition that some other food than animal 
                                                                           385
food must be substituted for the human family. We do not need flesh food at all. God can give us something else.
